body_html:
The evaluation always returns the same value even if training is actually
going fine. I probably just don't understand how to use this properly. What
should be the function call so that it runs the evaluation on the whole
validation set every time? Thanks for your help!
On Fri, 22 Jul 2016 at 18:02, Martin Wicke notifications@github.com wrote:

That's a harmless info message emitted when eval hits the end of the eval
data. You say only the first eval step is done properly -- what happens
instead?

—

body:
The evaluation always returns the same value even if training is actually
going fine. I probably just don't understand how to use this properly. What
should be the function call so that it runs the evaluation on the whole
validation set every time? Thanks for your help!
On Fri, 22 Jul 2016 at 18:02, Martin Wicke notifications@github.com wrote:

> That's a harmless info message emitted when eval hits the end of the eval
> data. You say only the first eval step is done properly -- what happens
> instead?
